divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i moved into our new house in october. i started to have these strange feelings at night. after a failed break in attempt i installed security cameras on my home as well as a fifth one directed at the horizon behind my home. i have captured some very strange crafts along with a little white being that seems to have an interest in me\my home. i do have a youtube channel with some of my footage on it. you can find it by looking up, [name removed\cms\tg] or the email associated with the account, [email removed\cms\tg] . please feel free to call or email me. ps. i am having to contact you due to a recent hard drive issue with my desktop so i cant upload to your site but i do have the footage. pss.the camera that watches the sky was disconnected some how, if you saw my connection type you would see that it must take some force to do this.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Piedmont
There were no other sightings in Piedmont on or around October 9th 2012
Summary: constant, i have footage of events.
